title: Bug 49195: Error message displayed when using 1 as shutdown port with Windows service
description: When specifying '<Server port="1"' in server.xml, Tomcat works as expected but displays an error message. This behavior could be improved. It is possible that the same behavior is observed with jsvc.
OB: When starting the Tomcat service with <Server port="1" in server.xml and stopping the service, an error message is printed.
EB: When starting the Tomcat service with <Server port="1" in server.xml and stopping the service, no error message should be printed.
SR:
1. Install Tomcat as a service on Windows.
2. Start the service.
3. Stop the service.
4. Shut down the server through an OS signal or by calling Catalina.stop().
